calculateExpiredDelegations(address).details: Can be used in tandem with writeNewCheckpointForExpirations() to write a new checkpointLong time periods between checkpoints can increase gas costs for delegate() and castVote()See _calculateExpirations

returns.calculatedCheckpoint: A new DelegateCheckpoint to write based on expirations since previous checkpoint

clock().details: Clock used for flagging checkpoints. Can be overridden to implement timestamp based checkpoints (and voting).

getCheckpoint(address,uint32).details: Get the checkpoint for a delegate at a given index.

getPastTotalSupply(uint256).details: Must use block.number instead of timestamp because VE_FXS.totalSupply(timestamp) doesn't work for historical values.

params.blockNumber: block.number of total supply, must be in past

params.timepoint: A block.timestamp, typically corresponding to a proposal snapshot, must be in past

returns.pastVotingWeight: Voting weight of ```account``` at ```timepoint``` in past

params.timepoint: A block.timestamp, typically corresponding to a proposal snapshot

writeNewCheckpointForExpiredDelegations(.details: Long time periods between checkpoints can increase gas costs for delegate() and castVote()See _calculateExpirations

$delegateCheckpoints(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from delegate to their checkpoints. Checkpoints correspond to daily rounded dates of delegation.

$delegations(address).notice: Mapping from delegator to delegate including additional parameters for our weight calculations.

$expiredDelegations(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from delegate to weekly rounded time of expiry to the aggregated values at time of expiration. Mirrors veFXS expiration.

$nonces(address).notice: Nonces needed for delegations by signature

DELEGATION_TYPEHASH().notice: Typehash needed for delegations by signature

VOTE_WEIGHT_MULTIPLIER().notice: vote weight multiplier taken from veFXS

calculateExpiredDelegations(address).notice: The ```calculateExpirations``` function calculates all expired delegations for an account since the last checkpoint.

constructor.notice: The ```constructor``` function is called on deployment

delegate(address).notice: The ```delegate``` function delegates votes from signer to ```delegatee``` at the next epoch

delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: The ```delegate``` function delegates votes from signer to ```delegatee```

delegates(address).notice: The ```delegates``` function returns who the address of the delegate, that delegatorAddress has chosen

getCheckpoint(address,uint32).notice: The ```getCheckpoint``` function is called to retrieve a specific delegation checkpoint

getPastTotalSupply(uint256).notice: The ```getPastTotalSupply``` function retrieves the total supply of veFXS at ```blockNumber```

getPastVotes(address,uint256).notice: The ```getPastVotes``` function calculates a voter's weight at ```timepoint```

getVotes(address).notice: The ```getVotes``` function calculates a voter's weight at the current block.timestamp

getVotes(address,uint256).notice: The ```getVotes``` function calculates a voter's weight at ```timestamp```

writeNewCheckpointForExpiredDelegations(.notice: The ```writeNewCheckpointForExpirations``` function writes a new checkpoint if any weight has expired since the previous checkpoint
